documents.summary: This guide provides instructions for installing and configuring the Cline VS Code extension to use Z.AI's GLM models via an OpenAI-compatible API. It covers plugin setup, API parameter configuration, and integration with additional MCP servers for enhanced functionality.

documents.title: n8n Workflow
documents.description: > ## Documentation Index > Fetch the complete documentation index at: https://docs.z.ai/llms.txt > Use this file to discover all available pages before exploring further.
documents.summary: This document provides step-by-step instructions for integrating Z.AI GLM models into n8n workflows using the OpenAI node. It covers API key acquisition, credential setup, and workflow execution to automate AI-driven tasks.
